phrases: These days you love me no more
nor am I still treasured by you
What did you tell me when we parted?
The words hung in midair and never reached me
I know my dreams and wishes are illusory
and yet I cannot give up on them
You said, Do not let go, hold onto my hand
and, We will always be together
Your hands as I held them were warm
and tries to hurt you with cruel words,
even if the world does not try to believe you
and places a crown of thorns upon your head,
I can take your side, and yours alone
I know your pain and loneliness
So everything that makes me whole
I will give that to you now
For the sake of new lives to come,
do not forget to get vaccinated
since I took this monorail to school.
The time I spent with the Undertakers felt much longer than it really was...
And the truth is, going to school scares me.
Is not that the guy who got picked up by GHQ?
Hiromi said she saw it all.
That guy's a criminal, you know!
That is not something you say without evidence.
If you are a true Tennozu First High School student, you should be ashamed of yourself.
Did the GHQ employees treat you well?
It must have been a nuisance to be interviewed,
but we have to cooperate with the government, do not we?
Apparently a cell phone I found belonged to GHQ, so...
I am sure plenty of people spread nasty rumors,
but if you ever need anything, I will
Is it really Shu that I see afoot?!
Did they feed you pork on rice?!
Wait, it is GHQ, so would they have hamburgers and stuff?
Is the military really full of homos?
You are climbing the stairway to adulthood, you jerk!
Ouma, I did not know you knew President Kuhouin.
Miss President, please shake my hand!
It looks like I was worrying too much.
I only did what any student council president would.
She is the heir to the Kuhouin Group,
an all-around hottie, a star student,
and she is got a sparkling personality.
Anyway, here is the World History homework,
and this folder has the Infection Control text.
It is kind of heavy stuff, but...
I forgot we had an Infection Control exam.
I heard he had not come to school since the day I got picked up...
Shu, you are not happy to have your mother back home?
Shu's been kind enough to let me live here.
It is not what you think!
Er, she has a violent older brother,
and he is really awful to her, so I am hiding her here!
But, see, he acts like a saint in front of other people,
so nobody doubts him... plus he is really tough...
What do you want, pepperoni pizza or cheese?
Hmm, I kind of think I want cake.
Shu, would you go pick some up?
We will have a tasty dinner while you tell me the whole story.
Gai, are you sure it was okay to let Shu go back to school?
He will make a good decoy.
Well, Inori's with him, at least.
Gai, the last few fights have left us short on equipment.
We got some money out of the OAU, did not we?
We may have funds, but we do not have a way of buying weapons,
Controls on the market are only getting tighter.
The Kuhouin Group's overall distribution control
is down 25 points from last year.
Article 301 of GHQ's special law taking effect last month is what
I do not need excuses for your failure.
You are coming with me to the party tomorrow.
I will be leaving the backroom jobs in your hands too one day.
How to put it... she makes you feel protective, I guess?
She is a lot stronger than me, but...
she seems really weak sometimes, too.
Cannot a mother cuddle her son?
With this, I can manage to make an impression at tomorrow's party!
Got To strike a good blow when you take a new post
or you do not make an impression, right?
As of today you guys are my subordinates,
so let us show some guts, okay?
I do not mean any offense, Colonel Eagleman, but
I told you, keep things friendly and call me Dan!
Mr. Dan... these Dragoons are surface-to-air missiles,
and therefore are not designed to fire on a ship at sea...
If they can fly up, they can fly sideways too!
And what ship might we be targeting?
A Jap who is hostile to GHQ is having a party at sea.
He must be planning to strike a deal outside of quarantined waters.
Where did you obtain that information, Sir?
that this country cannot live without us at GHQ!
It is been ten years now since GHQ took over administration of our country.
It seems that was rather too long for us to bide our time.
We, the Japanese people, must raise our heads and stand on our own two feet.
You just called me up out of the blue with a mission.
A little late for cold feet.
So, what is the mission, anyway?
There is someone I want to talk to.
But the guy's not the type to appear on the public stage very often.
So we are forcing ourselves on him at his party?
I did not think you would do me the honor of attending.
Did you tell Keido about today?
And after all, I bear a part of the responsibility for this.
She was talking about this party?!
The rest is up to you!
You reminded me of an old acquaintance.
She really was just like you,
the way she would curl up into a tight, little ball to protect herself.
I feel bad, making you a GHQ errand boy like this.
it is only natural that the Anti Bodies be dropped.
They did not run away fast enough.
Right around now they are with the sportsman, throwing the first pitch.
We have finished preparations to fire the missiles sideways, Sir.
See, I knew you could do it!
You have got to be kidding me.
It is en route from Point L-11 to Point R-22, just like the report said.
I am Ouma, with Sephirah Genomics.
This might be the first time I have ever seen Haruka at work.
Shu, get a message to Gai!
A commercial ship does not stand a chance!
There is a ferry, so take Gai and
If I run, what happens to the people on this ship?
We cannot do anything about that!
What are you going to do, Shu?
Gai and I will manage something, just you watch.
I do not recall sending you an invitation...
I imagine you will grant me an invitation next time.
Sir, I would like you to purchase Japan's future.
Tsugumi says GHQ missiles are coming for this ship!
So they want to take us down, ship and all?
What do we do to save this ship?
I will be there in five minutes.
Okay, let us give this a whirl!
I will save you for sure!
Miss Arisa, please give me the next waltz.
No, please dance it with me.
Sorry, but we are doing a rock'n roll number.
You have got less than a minute before impact!
I have never met such a rude man before in my life!
I am honored to be your first.
Do not get smart with me!
I am about to cast a spell on you.
A spell to let you become your true self.
After I count down from three, open your eyes.
Are you sure your instruments have not gone haywire?
We did not have enough guts!
Next time we will fire all of them!
Okay, men, let us get serious now!
The coward's shield that armors the weak self inside.
That is your Void, Kuhouin Arisa.
Well... we are out of missiles, Sir.
I concede that your group has a means
of defending against a second-order Leukocyte.
A live demonstration makes for very convincing evidence.
The Kuhouin Group will be aiding us with our domestic routes.
But I wonder how GHQ knew about the party at sea...
Someone who calls himself upstanding cannot possibly be that.
But I must thank you for carrying me here.
You talked in your sleep, you know.
I am perfect in academics, sports, etiquetteeverything!
You suck at letting people spoil you.
Haruka, do not come outside in that!
You look like you are having fun.
For the first time, I think maybe I am glad I can use Voids.
We have to protect Shu's future.
